Alliance's Computer/Vamprah:

"Stasis Lock retired 90%... Subject's energy level 25%... Spark's 
status: stable" reported again.

Vamprah moved her body tensed, as if she tried to stand up. She 
started to wake up

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Squizzy::
> 
> Squizzy smiled, patiently waiting for Vamprah to wake up.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Alliance's Computer/Vamprah::
> > 
> > "Energy's level: 0... Subject's Reparation System is running... 
> > Stasis Lock retired 80%... Subject's Energy level: 35%... 
Weapons's 
> > Energy Level: 2%" reported Alliance's computer
> >
